content.raw: I don't think we need to `ASSERT` here.  That's because we already did an `ASSERT` earlier to ensure that `convertedElem` is not `nullptr`, and here we are just checking that `FirstChildElement("elemBB")` returns what we want.  If this fails, it is in theory possible to go on with the rest of the tests, so I think that `EXPECT` makes sense here.  But feel free to correct me if I missed something.
